titles.title: A concurrent resolution to correct the enrollment of S. 2843.

action.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

bill.summary: 10/21/1988--Introduced. Makes corrections in the enrollment of S. 2843 (Generic Animal Drug and Patent Term Restoration Act).
